1/* $OpenBSD: explicit_bzero.c,v 1.4 2015/08/31 02:53:57 guenther Exp $ */
2/*

4 * Written by Matthew Dempsky.

6
7#include <string.h>
8
9#include "compat.h"
10
11void
12explicit_bzero(void *buf, size_t len)
13{
14 memset(buf, 0, len);
15}
